title: How to operate an industrial furnace - Quora

response.answer_text: Box furnace in our industry is still relatively common, we will take you to understand the operation of it. 1. The box furnace must be equipped with stable performance, good precision paper recorder (Fuji series), and the necessary current, voltmeter and other instruments. 2. Box furnace electrical control: the electrical control system controls the action signals and alarm information.When the temperature of the heating chamber of the box furnace exceeds the limit, an alarm will be generated. At the same time, the driving circuit of the module will be forcibly cut off. When the alarm, the sound and light prompt will be triggered. 3. The front of the box-type furnace cabinet is a door opening structure.The door is provided with the lighting switch device interlocked with the cabinet. When the user opens the cabinet door, the lighting inside the cabinet enables the user to clearly observe and maintain each control element. The cable connection of each component device inside the cabinet is laid in the slot of PVC belt cover, making the whole cabinet clear, clear and tidy.  Box Furnace  Industrial Box Furnace  Box-type Furnace 4. Cabinet cabinet has good cooling and dustproof conditions.All the cables in the box furnace are laid in the line slot or through pipes, and connected to the main cabinet or the specified crossing box. The terminals of the cables connected to the main cabinet or the main cabinet are equipped with unique wire Numbers. All the exposed mechanical transmission parts in the box furnace, including the power supply inlet and output terminals, are equipped with protective covers and warning signs.  Imported Full Fiber Box Furnace  Experimental Furnace National Standard Box Furnace 5. The control cabinet of each control system of box-type furnace shall be integrated, reasonably arranged and easy to operate.The appearance of control cabinet should be firm and beautiful.When permitted, priority should be given to the advanced parts, control instruments and electrical components in the same products both at home and abroad.
